MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the CW1 postcode area of Crewe, affecting properties in Warmingham Road and surrounding streets. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:45PM due to a broken piece of equipment. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 10PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:23PM on 30th Novemeber 2020
